DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of new tablet formulations of Premarin速/medroxyprogesterone (MPA).
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Premarin速/MPA, PREMPRO速 and Provera速 in Healthy Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Healthy postmenopausal women aged 35 to 70 years with spontaneous or surgical amenorrhea BMI in the range of 18 to 35 kg/m2 History or presence of hypertension (>139 mm Hg systolic or >89 mm Hg diastolic) History of drug allergy, particularly to conjugated estrogens (CE) or selective estrogen receptor modulators (SERMs) Use of any prescription or investigational drug within 30 days before test article administration
